Academic Research


Project Description University Year
Explorative research on psycotherapy clinical session transcripts Currently applying data mining algorithms to identify patterns and model what topics are treated during the clinical sessions of a clinician’s patient. Università di Pavia                      2023
Unsupervised Learning for Multi-Model Consensus Maximization            A deep approach for fitting multiple parametric models in an unsupervised fashion from point clouds. GitHub link here. Politecnico di Milano 2021
Syndalib a Python library to generate data points for multi-class multi-model problems. Check it out here. Politecnico di Milano 2020

Academic Projects


Name Description Link Tech Stack Year
Coursera course on RL Written teaching material on ML based methods for the Coursera course Advanced Recommender Systems link   2021
Android Game Development Developed 4 games (i.e. Memory) for Italian Senile Dementia Treatment Center to test their cognitive abilities   Android; LibGDX 2021
ML Notes Android App Developed app that gathers markdown notes of academic courses I attended, enriched with quizzes and embedded YouTube Videos link Android 2020
Study on word embeddings bias Analyzed four papers to investigate methodologies for debiasing word embeddings link   2020
University Deep Learning Competition Competition consisting in the implementation of Keras models to perform three different tasks: classification; binary segmentation; visual question answering. Ranked 2nd out of 30 teams. link Python; Keras; scikit-learn; 2020
Software Engineering Document Drafting Project Drafted two Latex documents for a fictitious company, specifying requirements, use cases, interactions, system architecture, and UI. link Latex 2019
Sagrada Board Game Bachelor of Science Thesis: Software version of the boardgame Sagrada. link Java; JavaFX 2018
RESTful website Developed RESTful website for fictitious healthcare institution. link HTML; CSS; Bootstrap; JavaScript; NodeJS 2018
NDTM Simulator Developed a Non-Deterministic Turing Machines’ simulator paying particular attention to time and space complexity constraints link C 2017
File System Developed a file system simulator paying particular attention to time and space complexity constraints link C 2016
